name: ANDY_3000
tagline: Twitter bot that makes fun of me using Markov chaining
body: **ANDY_3000** is a Twitter bot made to make fun of me. By using Markov text chaining and the Twitter API, **ANDY_3000** publishes gibberish tweets that sound similar to things I might say. Tweets by @ANDO_3000
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
